programme.title: O quinto combate entre Tenten e Temari. Tenten, mestre em armas areas e vrias outras, que so repelidas pelo leque de Temari. O sexto combate entre Shikamaru e Kin. Kin parece estar em vantagem, mas Shikamaru usa seu Jutsu Possesso da Sombra.

programme.sub-title: A Kunoichi Assassina E Um Trmulo Shikamaru

programme.title: No stimo combate, Naruto enfrenta Kiba, que traz seu cachorro Akamaru. Kiba usa o Jutsu Quatro Patas para atacar Naruto, que consegue virar a mesa. Entretanto, Akamaru e Kiba consomem Plulas de Comida e comeam um ataque intenso contra Naruto.
programme.desc: Naruto: Akamaru Se Revela, Quem O Melhor Cachorro?
programme.sub-title: Akamaru Se Revela, Quem O Melhor Cachorro?

programme.title: Depois de consumir Plulas de Comida, os nveis de chakra de Kiba e Akamaru aumentam, e ambos comeam a contra-atacar Naruto. Naruto usa Jutsu de Transformao contra Kiba e tenta ganhar com uma nova manobra secreta. O que ser que Naruto planejou?!

programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Byakugan: Hinata Ganha Coragem!

programme.title: Hinata enfrenta Neji, mas ele ataca o ponto de presso dela com Byakugan (olhos brancos). O fluxo de chakra de Hinata para, e ela quase perde a conscincia. Ela encontra coragem ao lembrar como Naruto no desiste de nenhuma dificuldade.
programme.desc: Naruto: Uma Derrota Digna

programme.title: No nono combate, Gaara finalmente aparece e seu oponente Lee, um especialista em taijutsu (tcnica fsica). Lee usa esta poderosa tcnica contra Gaara, que manipula areia de sua cabaa. Ento, a Armadura de Areia de Gaara finalmente se solta...

programme.title: Jake Grando, (2012, Western)
programme.desc: Um velho pecuarista do Texas, que j viveu o ponto alto da vida, entra em ao quando bandidos sequestram seu neto e ferem seu filho.

programme.desc: Travado e cheio de chumbo, cortesia de seu ex-amigo, o poltico inescrupuloso e amante do dinheiro David Barry, Django se v vagando de uma cidade empoeirada para outra trabalhando como carrasco.

programme.title: O Passado No Perdoa, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A famlia Zachary uma famlia rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua me, alm dos outros trs filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que adotada.

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Um jovem pistoleiro, ferido em uma luta, escondido e cuidado por artistas de circo. O homem perseguido por alguns bandidos que querem se apropriar de sua mina de ouro. Quando os bandidos descobrem o esconderijo do pistoleiro, comea uma longa batalha.

programme.title: Por uns Dlares a Mais, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Monco um astuto caador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: Se Encontrar Sartana, Reze pela sua Morte, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: O lendrio heri Sartana chamado para investigar uma srie de roubos e assassinatos, que levam a consequncias surpreendentes.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Crime)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de trfico sexual.

programme.title: Assassinato no Expresso do Inferno, (2018, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Os passageiros de um trem so surpreendidos por um assalto que termina em assassinato.

programme.title: Uma ltima Vez, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan Derringer um dentista solitrio na Flrida. Quando confrontado por uma figura do passado trazendo notcias, ele precisa embarcar em uma jornada de descobertas fantsticas e tambm desesperadoras, que vai mudar sua vida para sempre.

programme.title: Legado de Violncia, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando seu filho envolvido com negcios perigosos e pessoas de mau carter foge, um pai se v em meio a uma crise pessoal e familiar.

programme.title: Em rota de coliso, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um grupo de terroristas russos sequestra um avio americano e planeja derrub-lo em uma usina nuclear perto de Washington D.C. Cabe tripulao e aos passageiros do voo, a misso de impedi-los antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Contgio em Alto Mar, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A tripulao de uma traineira do oeste da Irlanda, abandonada no mar, luta por suas vidas contra um parasita crescente em seu abastecimento de gua.

programme.title: Crimes Obscuros, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: O policial Tadek investiga um caso de assassinato no resolvido e encontra semelhanas do crime em um livro do artista polons Krystov Kozlow. Ele comea a investigar a vida do escritor e da sua namorada, uma mulher misteriosa que trabalha num sex club.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Crime)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em guas abertas, mas o diretor da priso local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Prisioneiro Espacial, (2020, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando Issac acorda dentro de uma sala estranha, ele descobre que na verdade um prisioneiro, que foi enviado ao espao para iniciar a primeira colnia da Terra fora do mundo como uma nova punio.

programme.title: Legado de Violncia, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando seu filho envolvido com negcios perigosos e pessoas de mau carter foge, um pai se v em meio a uma crise pessoal e familiar.

programme.title: A Maldio do Titanic, (2022, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos aps um dos maiores desastres da histria, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural at os destroos do navio original. Mas foras sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaam repetir a histria.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubaro de 3 Cabeas, (2015, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A maior mquina de matar do mundo trs vezes mais mortal quando um tubaro mutante ameaa um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos, (1985, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrneo na Flrida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenas entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: O feitio da Casa Whaley, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Quando um guia de turismo invade a Casa Mais Assombrada dos Estados Unidos, um pouco de caa aos fantasmas amadores com amigos se transforma em mais horror do que eles jamais poderiam imaginar.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contgio, (2005, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalao aps a liberao de uma bactria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituio psiquitrica encontra um velho tubo de vcuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactrias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: O Monstro dentro de voc, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Depois de uma noite de festa Lou se levanta com sintomas desagradveis que indicam que algo est errado. Seu corpo muda pouco a pouco de uma maneira estranha, h manchas em sua pele e ele tem vises que a impedem de distinguir a realidade da fico.

programme.title: Necrotrio, (2006, Zombies)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitrios se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerria pode ter sido libertado de um manicmio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: Death Note: Ally
programme.desc: Though L is still suspicious, Light and Misa, their memories of being Kira wiped clean, return to headquarters.

programme.title: Death Note: Matsuda
programme.desc: Matsuda, the task force member assigned to watch Misa, is eager to distinguish himself.

programme.title: Death Note: Makeshift
programme.desc: L's team discovers that the Yotsuba Group meet in secret to discuss the elimination of individuals who are troublesome to their company.

programme.title: Death Note: Performance
programme.desc: The Yotsuba Group hires Eraldo Coil to uncover L's identity.

programme.title: Death Note: Guidance
programme.desc: Misa succeeds in narrowing down the Kira suspects in the Yotsuba Group to one: Higuchi.

programme.title: Death Note: Frenzy
programme.desc: Higuchi of the Yotsuba Group attempts to kill Matsuda of the task force, and is surprised when he doesn't die after 40 seconds.

programme.title: Death Note: Revival
programme.desc: Higuchi is captured and tells the investigators about the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Silence
programme.desc: Light, his memory recovered, orders Misa to begin killing after Higuchi dies.

programme.title: Death Note: Renewal
programme.desc: Light has removed everyone in his way and is closer to achieving his perfect world.

programme.title: Death Note: Abduction
programme.desc: A new investigator steps forward, Near, a central figure in the SPK, an organization that is trying to catch Kira without relying on L.

programme.title: Death Note: Impatience
programme.desc: Light, acting as L, reveals to Near that his sister Sayu has been kidnapped by someone wanting to trade her for the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Father
programme.desc: Light tries to discover where Mello and his Mafia associates are hiding and uses Misa's eyes to find the Death Note's current owner.

programme.title: Death Note: Justice
programme.desc: Mello busts into SPK headquarters to retrieve a photograph of himself to make sure he won't be killed by Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Transfer
programme.desc: Near contacts the Japanese task force and determines that Kira is among their members.

programme.title: Death Note: Selection
programme.desc: Star newscaster Kiyomi Takada becomes Kira's spokesperson to the world.

programme.title: Death Note: Scorn
programme.desc: Light pretends to investigate Kiyomi.

programme.title: Death Note: Vigilance
programme.desc: Aizawa figures out what's going on and tells Near, who already knows about the notes.

programme.title: Death Note: Malice
programme.desc: Light gives Kiyomi the order to finish off Near.

programme.title: Death Note: 1.28
programme.desc: Near, along with the SPK, meets Light and the task force at a warehouse for the final showdown.

programme.title: Death Note: New World
programme.desc: Though Mikami has written all the investigators' names in the Death Note, a minute passes and everyone is still alive.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: The Angel Brigade's original purpose was to discover lost technology, but they end up doing household duties.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: On this day, the Angel Brigade is supposed to welcome their newest member but Forte and Ranpha have gone on a vacation to a casino.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: The Angel Brigade has been assigned to sort trash. They have been told that there is a Lost Technology buried in the trash.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: The Angel Brigade has been sent to protect the president of a company. Ranpha is initially excited because the president looks cute but is astonished when the president actually turns out to be an old man.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: In request of Duke Crizeman, Milfeulle and Ranpha are sent to return his student ID card to an abandoned school in Area Enigma, a dangerous area that is said to be infested with pirates.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: In this episode, Forte, Milfeulle, and Normad are to find lost technology on a planet. Milfeulle finds an egg and tries to cook it but the egg wouldn't crack. The strange egg then hatches and a mouse comes out.
programme.sub-title: Forte's Ruinous Stew with a Dash of Trouble

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: Mint, Vanilla, and Milfeulle are sent to Chickendee Planet to find and catch the kidnappers who have been kidnapping children. Everyone dresses up in costumes and tries to find who the kidnappers are.
programme.sub-title: Fun Park Specialties with Chicken Mint Compote

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: A commander and his helper have come to the Angel Base hoping to find lost technology thinking that the Angel Brigade found many and hid them secretly in their base.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: The Angels board a derelict spaceship to look for the lost technology. The spaceship is apparently haunted as ghosts appear from nowhere and chase them around.
programme.sub-title: The Roast Beef of Lost Technology

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: A misdelivered package arrives at the doorstep of a love-crazed Ranpha who has recently lost her former boyfriend Melty Way. It turns out to be an android lover from the Full Monty Company.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: In an Old West-style town, Forte and Vanilla have been dispatched to search for Lost Technology. Forte and Vanilla both split their own ways with Vanilla working for the doctor of the local clinic.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: The Angels play a baseball game against the men from the Transbaal Navy. Due to Colonel Volcott's drunken stupor and a bet he made with the Admiral, they have to win the game or else they must wear negligees and be conscripted into the Navy if they lose.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: Mint and Ranpha were kidnapped during a mission and the kidnappers demand a large ransom in return. Unable to pay off the ransom, Forte and Milfeulle devise a plan to get the money by faking another kidnapping incident with Colonel Volcott.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: Forte befriends a juvenile delinquent girl named Milly who was the daughter of a crime boss. She tries to cheat out of paying for food before Forte sees her gun and notes something strange about Milly.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: Vanilla allegedly loses a valuable item that she was carrying with her at all times. As a result, she has fasted for two weeks and hasn't eaten a bite since then. Unless the mysterious item can be found, Vanilla won't break her fast and will die.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: Forte comes back after a long mission, only to find that everyone believes she is dead! Apparently, Ranpha used Forte's "death" as an excuse for missing her date with a guy she likes, letting the situation go out of hand.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: The Angels' new mission is capturing a runaway sentient tank. Milfeulle and Mint get on the tank as it rampages in the city. Has the sentient tank developed feelings of friendship for the two girls? Can the Angels successfully stop it?

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: Forte destroys her engine after pushing it too hard without breaking it in. Forte, Mint, and Vanilla find the nearest space station in an attempt to try to get Forte's engine repaired.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: Lucky Milfeulle wins a free dinner at a fancy restaurant and brings Normad along as a date to teach her table manners. On the way there, they chance upon a pastry stall and Milfeulle is impressed with the delicious pastries.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: The military plane that Mint and Forte were traveling in crashes, stranding them on a deserted island. Mint and Forte team up with the island's sole resident Max to find ways to call for help.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: Ranpha, Mint, and Vanilla go to a pizzeria that is open in late-night hours. However, the pizzeria is unexpectedly closed. Ranpha does not believe it and sneaks in.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: During the search for the lost technology, Mint gets stuck in a cutboard figure on top of the mountain viewing area. Meanwhile the mountain is sinking into the sea.
programme.sub-title: Sign Girl Special Secret Fried Roll

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: The Angels are approached by Mr. God, a retired comedian who tries to make Vanilla laugh. He failed to do so in his last show despite everyone else laughing, resulting in an accident.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: The human race is being attacked by its mysterious arch-enemy, a giant dice named Kyutaro. As the Angels try to attack Kyutaro, the dice is invulnerable to any human attack and easily defeats the Angels.

programme.title: Galaxy Angel
programme.desc: The Angels are filing their expense reports when the Commander informs them that the Milfeulle who has been with them all this time is a fake.

programme.title: The Art of War, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: Bad Boys, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Miami cops Will Smith and Martin Lawrence are two loose cannons who tear up the Sunshine State in search of stolen drugs. Co-starring Tea Leoni. Explosive direction by Michael Bay (Armageddon).

programme.title: Bad Boys 2, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The action and comedy never stop when Martin Lawrence and Will Smith reunite as out-of-control trash-talking buddy cops. Bullets fly, cars crash, and laughs explode as they pursue a whacked-out drug lord from the streets of Miami to the barrios of Cuba.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.desc: Cult comic-book artist Holden falls head-over-heals with fellow artist Alyssa, but for that love to live, he'll need to contend with his disapproving best friend Banky, her sexuality, and his own misgivings about himself in this Kevin Smith classic.

programme.title: Terrifier 3, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Art the Clown is set to unleash chaos on the unsuspecting residents of Miles County as they peacefully drift off to sleep on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Witch Hunt (2019), (2021, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: In a modern America where witchcraft is illegal, a sheltered teenager must face her own prejudices to help two witches evade execution and reach asylum in Mexico.

programme.title: Jakob's Wife, (2021, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: After an encounter with "The Master," Anne discovers bite marks on her neck, a new sense of power and an appetite to live bolder than ever before.

programme.desc: Something is killing off townsfolk in Tarker's Mills. Something ingenious. Something remotely human. But the only person in town with courage to stop this lurking menace is a 13-year-old boy, confined to a wheelchair since birth.

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive, (1986, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious comet turns every machine on Earth into a homicidal rampage device, the survivors at the Dixie Boy Truck Stop are making a stand, and human vengeance goes into overdrive.

programme.title: The Evil Dead, (1983, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: Stephen King's Silver Bullet, (1985, Werewolves)

programme.title: Save The Tiger, (1973, Drama)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon plays Harry Stoner, a man caught in violent collision with his past and present life. He believes there is nothing significant in his life except survival, and that instinct pushes him beyond moral conduct.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats battle creepy-crawly forest creatures on their quest to capture a South Bird, Mont Blanc and his monkey minions are brutally attacked by the Bellamy Pirates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dreams Don't Come True?! Bellamy Versus the Saruyama Alliance!

programme.title: Luffy turned the other cheek during his first encounter with Bellamy, but now hes out to settle the score for old man Mont Blanc. Meanwhile, a fearsome pirate crew takes aim at the Straw Hats, eager to earn a bad reputation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: 100 Million Man! World's Greatest Power and Pirate Black Beard!

programme.title: Thanks to some modifications to the Going Merry, the Straw Hats are on their way to that island in the sky! But with the Blackbeard Pirates in hot pursuit, navigating the vertical currents will be anything but easy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Take to the Sky! Ride the Knockup Stream!

programme.title: Reaching the sea of clouds proves easier than surviving in it when giant sea creatures attack the Going Merry, Usopp nearly drowns in a cloud, and a strange sky knight issues the Straw Hats a warning!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sail the white sea! The sky knight and the gate in the clouds!

programme.title: After hitching a ride on a speedy shrimp, the Straw Hats reach the land of Skypiea! The intrepid pirates have much to learn about their new surroundings, but a beautiful angel makes a perfect tour guide.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Godland, skypiea! Angels on a beach of clouds!

programme.title: Namis eagerness to explore the forbidden realm of Upper Yard brings her face to face with the wrath of god, and the Straw Hats incur Heavens Judgment for failing to pay their immigration fees!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The forbidden sacred ground! The island where god lives and heaven's judgement!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are no strangers to living on the wrong side of the law, but unpaid immigration fees and Namis assault of a White Beret earns Luffys crew a sentence of death by cloud drifting!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Already criminals?! Skypiea's upholder of the law!

programme.title: Nami, Zoro, Chopper, and Robin are trapped aboard the Going Merry when its commandeered by a monstrous lobster! To rescue his crew, Luffy must venture onto the sacred grounds of Upper Yard!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Is escape possible?! God's challenge is set in motion!

programme.title: Conis helps Luffy and his mates launch their rescue mission, but the rubber-man senses something amiss. When he presses her for answers, a vengeful god takes a shot at the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A trap on lovely street! The almighty eneru!

programme.title: Zoro dukes it out with a hungry Skyshark in the shadow of the Sacrificial Alter. On the other side of Upper Yard, Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp try to survive their visit to an island that wants them dead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Onward, crow! To the sacrifical altar!

programme.title: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp tangle with Satori and his exploding, snake-filled Surprise Clouds. The sky priest may look like a dancing dango, but the impact of his mantra leaves the pirates bloodied and boatless.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: 10% survival rate! Satori, the mantra master!

programme.title: Usopp and Sanji try to regain control of the Crow, and Luffy stirs up a brutal barrage of bursting balls when he attacks Satori. Meanwhile, Chopper whistles for the Sky Knight to avoid becoming a sacrificial reindeer!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of spheres! Desperate struggle in the lost forest!

programme.title: Chopper fights bravely to stop Shura from incinerating the Going Merry, but the little reindeer is no match for a sky priest. Gan Fall is on his way, but will the dispossessed deity arrive in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chopper in danger! Former god vs. Priest shura!

programme.title: When Gan Fall is badly burned during his battle with Shura, Chopper musters the courage for a death-defying leap of faith. Elsewhere, Luffy may have finally discovered a way to defeat Satori!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Profound mystery! Ordeal of string and ordeal of love?!

programme.title: The Shandorians prepare for an all-out attack on their priestly adversaries, Chopper meets the mysterious creatures that saved his life, and Nami makes an astonishing discovery about the origins of Upper Yard.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Light the fire of shandora! Wyper, the warrior!

programme.title: While the Shandorians continue their battle for control of Upper Yard, the Straw Hats celebrate their happy reunion by swapping stories over a campfire and feasting on barbequed Skyshark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Jaya, city of gold in the sky! Head for god's shrine!

programme.title: Lakis pursuit of precious Vearth causes one of her Shandorian comrades to be injured during the battle with Ohm. As night falls on Upper Yard, the Straw Hats dream of gold while dancing with wolves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Festival on the night before gold-hunting! Feelings for vearth!

programme.title: The electrifying deity of Skypiea, God Eneru, grants his priests unlimited power in their hunt for the Straw Hats. Usopp has a plan to get the mysteriously-repaired Going Merry back in the water, but it involves using Chopper as bait!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter god eneru!! Farewell to the survivors!

programme.title: The Straw Hats scatter when their search for gold uncovers a giant python, and Gan Fall reveals the tragic story of Jayas arrival in the sky. Meanwhile, Wyper readies the Shandorians for a raid on Enerus shrine!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A giant snake bares its fangs! The survival game begins!

programme.title: As the heartless god of Upper Yard eagerly anticipates the dawning of Sky Warefare, the Shandorian forces are savagely snared by the Ordeal of String, and Luffy wanders into the fight of his life!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The deadly reject! War demon wyper's resolve!

programme.title: Zoro rushes to perfect a deadly technique known as the Flying Blade Attack. The move proves difficult to master, but it could be the key to the swordsman surviving a battle with the Shandorian warrior, Braham.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fierce midair battle! Pirate zoro vs. Warrior braham!

programme.title: Sanji and Usopp are driven to their knees by the electrifying presence of god, Luffy is nearly incinerated by Wypers Burn Bazooka, and Nami joins Gan Fall in a fight against two killer clones!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The roaring burn bazooka! Luffy vs. War demon wyper!

programme.title: Chopper unleashes the fury of his Rumble Ball during a sticky slugfest with a swap cloud spewing priest of Upper Yard. Can the little reindeer discover his opponents lone weakness before its too late?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of the swamp! Chopper vs. Sky punk gedatsu!

programme.title: Nami and the Knight of the Sky team up to obliterate two bumbling, balloon-shaped bad guys, and God Eneru relies on his astounding invincibility to torment a noble Shandorian warrior.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unbeatable powers! Eneru's true form is revealed!

programme.title: Robins search for a mystical city of gold is interrupted by Yama, one of Enerus faithful servants. When the rampaging warrior destroys some ancient ruins, he provokes the wrath of Robins many fists of fury!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mystical city! The grand ruins of shandora!

programme.title: Priest Ohm silences Chopper with an attack from which few if any ever recover. Meanwhile, Luffy begins to notice something strange about his cave-like prison, and four fearsome warriors prepare for battle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: 0% survival rate! Chopper vs. Ohm, the sword wielding priest!

programme.title: Zoro, Gan Fall, Wyper, Ohm, and a prizefighting pooch gather for a ferocious free-for-all at the site of the Upper Ruins. While the battle rages, Luffy tries to punch his way out of the belly of a poisonous python!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Climb giant jack! Deadly combat in the upper ruins!

programme.title: Zoro and Wyper are out to beat down the same bad guys, but will they realize it soon enough to survive a white-barbed death match of doom? Deep in the belly of the python, Nami and Luffy enjoy what could be a short-lived reunion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of iron! White barbed death match!

programme.title: Eager to end their battle, Zoro aims the awesome destructive power of his 108 Caliber Phoenix at the sinister Priest Ohm! Elsewhere, god demands that Robin help him search for a legendary golden bell.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: God Eneru begins a deadly rampage aimed at exterminating the heavenly beings of Skypiea, and the ruins of Shandora become the scene of a bloody contest where survival is the name of the game.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Collapsing upper ruins! The quintet for the finale!

programme.title: Gan Fall, Wyper, Zoro, and Robin join forces for an attack on God Eneru. Despite their furious onslaught, the four warriors prove powerless to harm the thunderous deity until Wyper utilizes the power of a mystical stone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the ancient ruins! Sky god eneru's goal!

programme.title: God Eneru makes a shocking recovery from wounds that should have ended his reign of terror. Zoro and Wyper muster the strength for one final stand, and Nami must choose between her friends and survival.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ambition toward the endless vearth! The ark maxim!

programme.title: Luffy emerges from his serpentine tomb with one thing on his mind: revenge! As the rubber-man sets out to settle the score with God Eneru, Conis rushes to warn her people of their impending doom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: They finally clash! Pirate luffy vs. God eneru!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"

programme.desc: When Zenigata is arrested for suspicion of being part of the Lupin gang, Lupin is talked into stealing Time Crystal to prove Pops' innocence.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz um serial killer de Londres que est matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polcia duro, inflexvel e politicamente incorreto, tero a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata.

programme.desc: Dr. Sullivan descobre que os fantasmas de Kayako e Toshio tm como alvo uma nova famlia. Se ela falhar em convencer uma misteriosa mulher japonesa a ajudar a banir os espritos vingativos, todos os envolvidos enfrentaro um destino pior do que a morte.

programme.title: Dia dos Namorados Macabro
programme.desc: H 20 anos, um trgico acidente no Dia dos Namorados matou cinco mineiros quando supervisores abandonaram seus postos para ir a um baile. No aniversrio da tragdia, o nico sobrevivente volta cidade em busca de uma vingana sangrenta.

programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: O Principal Suspeito

programme.title: Psicopata Americano
programme.desc: Patrick Bateman um yuppie de Wall Street, obcecado com sucesso, status, estilo, com uma noiva deslumbrante. Ele tambm um assassino psictico que estupra, mata e desmembra estranhos e conhecidos sem provocao ou propsito.

programme.desc: O mal usa espelhos para entrar na casa de um segurana com problemas.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Matador de Aluguel
programme.desc: Joe um detetive, mas tambm um assassino por encomenda. Quando Chris, um traficante, tem seu estoque roubado pela prpria me, ele resolve contratar os servios de 'Killer Joe' para se livrar da morte usando o dinheiro do seguro de vida de sua me.

programme.title: Clube da Luta
programme.desc: Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado.

programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivncia quando um tubaro de 6 cabeas comea a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: O Alvo Final
programme.desc: Depois de matar o dono de um bar em uma briga, Bobby Kalinowsky, um ex-membro do SEAL, deve procurar sua filha sequestrada.

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: O Guardio
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: Murder Company (2024)
programme.desc: During the D-Day invasion, a group of U.S. soldiers must smuggle a member of the French resistance behind enemy lines to assassinate a high-value Nazi target.

programme.title: Ride (2024)
programme.desc: Desperate to raise money for his daughters cancer treatment, a retired bull rider teams up with his estranged son to orchestrate a robbery. However, they must soon outwit the local police if they want to keep the cash and their freedom.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 3 (2011)
programme.desc: A videographer becomes obsessed with finding the source of disturbing late-night noises in his home and discovers its terrifying origin.

programme.title: Scream 4 (2011)
programme.desc: The Ghostface Killer returns with a vengeance when self-help author Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell) arrives in Woodsboro on the last stop of her book tour.

programme.title: Shell (2024)
programme.desc: Desperate to reclaim her career, once-beloved actress Samantha Lake gets drawn into the glamorous world of wellness mogul Zoe Shannon, only to uncover a monstrous truth beneath the seemingly flawless surface.

programme.title: American Dream/American Knightmare (2018)
programme.desc: The life and exploits of Suge Knight, the co-founder of Death Row Records, and his influence on a highly influential era in music.

programme.title: Defiance (2008)
programme.desc: In 1941 three refugee brothers (Daniel Craig, Liev Schreiber, Jamie Bell) turn a daily struggle to survive into a personal battle to save their people from the Nazis.

programme.title: Semper Fi (2007)
programme.desc: Filmmaker Vince DiPersio documents the experience of Jeff Key, a Marine who served in Iraq while hiding his homosexuality.

programme.title: Ricky Powell: The Individualist (2020)
programme.desc: Photographer Ricky Powell captures the music, fashion and art scene in New York City in the 1980s and 90s.

programme.title: Before Dawn (2024)
programme.desc: A young man joins his countrymen on the Western front of World War I, hoping to expedite an end to the bloody conflict. However, as the battle rages on, hes forced to grapple with the brutal realities of trench warfare.

programme.title: Wolves (2016)
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball players (Taylor John Smith) dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his hard-drinking fathers (Michael Shannon) compulsive gambling.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Hell or High Water (2016)
programme.desc: With a Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) hot on their tail, an ex-convict (Ben Foster) and his brother (Chris Pine) plan a series of heists against the bank thats about to foreclose on their family ranch.

programme.title: Allied (2016)
programme.desc: World War II operative Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) falls for French Resistance fighter Marianne Beausejour (Marion Cotillard) during a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Reunited in London, a devastating secret tests their love and loyalty to each other.

programme.title: Shooter (2007)
programme.desc: Reluctantly pressed into service again, a former military sniper plots revenge against his powerful foes after being betrayed and wounded.

programme.title: American Renegades (2017)
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: Snatch (2000)
programme.desc: An unlicensed boxing promoter gets involved with a big-time criminal, and a heist goes awry when a valuable jewel is missing.

programme.title: Shaft (2000)
programme.desc: A detective (Samuel L. Jackson) and a narcotics cop (Vanessa L. Williams) track a sociopath out to kill a woman who can testify that he committed murder.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven (2001)
programme.desc: Dapper Danny Ocean organizes a gang to steal $150 million from three Las Vegas casinos in a single heist.

programme.title: Oceans Twelve (2004)

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen (2007)
programme.desc: Danny Ocean and his gang hatch an ambitious plot for revenge after ruthless casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses Reuben Tishkoff, Dannys friend and mentor.

programme.title: Old Henry (2021)
programme.desc: A quiet man and his son take in a wounded stranger near his homestead, along with a bag full of cash. The stranger claims hes a sheriff being pursued by outlaws, but the man cant be sure.

programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.desc: A young man and his traveling companions battle an array of monsters during an 80-mile journey to find the woman he loves.

programme.title: McEnroe (2022)
programme.desc: John McEnroe finally tells his side of his storied career and performances on the court.

programme.title: Dreamland (2019)
programme.desc: A teen bounty hunter is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression.
